Effortlessly Export Your Kindle Highlights to a PDF

Transform your Kindle highlights into a beautifully organized PDF with just one click!

Simply open read.amazon.com/notebook and click the extension button. The extension automatically extracts all your highlights from every book in your Kindle library, organizes them sequentially, and compiles them into a neat, downloadable PDFâ€”perfect for reference, sharing, or offline reading.
